website_summaries.verdict: Considering the wide range of massage types and positions this chair can combine to knead your back, legs, shoulders, and beyond, it’s an incredible deal at this price.
pros: Features multiple positions and massage types

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This massage chair is so comfortable to sit on and having a automatic massage to relax the full body. The leather material is very good, they are soft and comfy. This massage chair is fine to put on the living room, it doesn't take a lot of spaces. Saving more money from going a massage place.:)
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: Chair is nice. It works most areas of the body and it does a decent job. However, after a couple days the remote screen had a warped appearance as in the photo. The link to register the product with the company didn't work, and an email to their support account never got returned. I'm worried that if there is an issue with the chair the advertised warranty will not matter. Again, chair is just fine, but i've gotten nowhere trying to resolve an issue with Ootori.
customer_reviews.author: mrdcool

customer_reviews.title: Company terrible! Chair good!
customer_reviews.text: We got this chair and love it. One of the legs became loose and started to make a noise after 5 months. Didn’t even realize we were buying directly the chair maker until we tried to get service to repair it and Bruce’s storefront refused. Ridiculous - not a cheap chair so you’d think it would go at least a year before breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and One Happy Wife
customer_reviews.text: We just got ours today and my wife is so happy with it. It's something she has wanted for a long time and this massager seems to do everything she wanted and more. Very happy with this purchase. Update: It's been over a month now and still loving this thing. We haven't had a single problem and it runs wonderfully. It does exactly what it says it will and all of my wife's friends are now coming over to see it, or see it again and again lol
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Rick

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: this chair is well made,set up easy and works great,my family don’t need to go massage place any more.a happy buying experience!
customer_reviews.author: ccccccccc

customer_reviews.title: Great massage chair, great value!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Relaxon Chair. It does everything it is supposed to do. It isn't too plush so you can actually feel your massage.Overall, I love this chair!
customer_reviews.author: Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Best family Christmas gift ever! I pay $80/month for an hour worth of massage per person. This chair is sooo worth it—- no appointment to make, I can get a massage everyday at my convenience
customer_reviews.author: mia

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought 6 different massage chairs. This is my second favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Davidenko

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I like strong massages but this is very strong. I have it on the low setting and its perfect. Quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made remote.
customer_reviews.text: Remote control broke in less than 24 hours of receiving the product. The machine would not turn off and the leg portion kept moving up and down randomly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could get in touch with co
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. But. I haven’t been able to register it because I can’t get in touch with one person at the company. No one ever answers phone. So this gives me great concern that the product was not registered and I can’t get in touch with anyone. Makes the 3 year warranty questionable. One thing about the chair. I had to cut a yoga mat and put where my back is on the chair because it was too hard on my back, even at the lowest intensity. The remote beeps forever when you turn it on which is annoying. Also wish it was a light up remote.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: It was not as comfortable as l would have liked.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is not meant for a large person. It comes with no directions so one is left experimenting with all the buttons. Arm sleeves are a tight fit. The back rollers have no pad soften the pounding requiring me to put a pillow behind my back. Very heavy piece. Unable to register for warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What’s most important to know?
customer_reviews.text: If I would’ve tested out this chair first I wouldn’t have bought it. It causes more pain than it fixes with the back rubbing feature, I have to use it with that option turned off so at least it’s usable and I did adjust the setting all the way back to the lowest option. The rest of the machine is fine but for the money I spent I’m not really happy about it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SL-Track is missleading
customer_reviews.text: Product description and images are misleading, SL Track is much shorter than shown in pictures or it is just S Track only. There is no 3D body scan it is a scam, seller tried to through all fancy trending words into description to mislead buyer,
customer_reviews.author: Sree

customer_reviews.title: Awesome massage chair
customer_reviews.text: I really love it. Compare to regular massage, Im enjoying with this zero gravity massage chair. The zero gravity special position distributes your weight evenly across the chair so you will feel virtually weightless, ensuring a deep sense of relaxation as you get a soothing massage. Not only the chair and also the customer service is extremely good. Any questions or problems I had, I emailed the company and they were very quick to respond. I am extremely happy with this purchase and expect to be for the next few years!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah O'Roark

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand why it has such good reviews. The quality is not really good. The customer service was not professional. Slow shipping. To be honest I am not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaowenjun

product_meta.title: SL-Track Massage Chair, Zero Gravity 3D Robert Hand Massage Chairs, Full Body Airbag 6 Auto Program Massaging Chair Recliner, Stretching Function, Bluetooth Speaker& Foot Roller
feature_bullets: Zero Gravity Positioning - comes with a 3-stage zero gravity feature which allows you to put your body into the most stressless & weightless position when using the chair. The two different settings will give you positioning options that cater to your level of comfort. In those positions, the rollers of the massage chair will dig more into your back muscles thus giving you an even more intense masssage experience, if desired

3D Rollers& L-TRACK:Connecting with ergonomics, L-track rollers glide from neck to lower back, provides an intimate massage for full body; smart body scan automatically detect your body size for a custom massage; all-round scraping and rolling function can effectively stimulate the plantar reflex zone to reduce your fatigue and improve the body's immunity

Mechanical Foot Rollers&38 Airbags:Foot rollers are what put the Infinity line on the map. It has become a very popular and sought-after feature.knows a good thing when they see it and won't leave it out on this top-of-the line chair.THis model has 3 rollers per foot.Although rollers are the dominant feature of this new and innovative chair, you still get your fill of airbag therapy: arms, calves, feet, shoulders, and seat.

Multiple Massage Techniques &Heated Massage:Kneading, rubbing, finger kneading, tapping, knocking, kneading and tapping, shiatsu, and pulse shiatsu including combinations of each built into the 6 auto programs.The 810L Massage chair offers heated massage to give you a full warming experience on your back.

Bluetooth&Posture Correction :You can run your device's playlists over the chair's speaker system. If you are really looking to relax, play your slow tunes over the chair's speakers . And the stretching model is he shoulder airbags will pin back the shoulders while the chair rollers move up and down your spine, thus working on the slumping posture that is so prevalent in our sedentary society. When you are done with your massage session, you will feel like you are standing an inch or two taller.
